```{r Libraries }
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(agricolae)
library(ggplot2)
library(zoo)
library(trend)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r readdata}
GFD_Raw <- as.data.frame(read_excel("~/Environmental Data Analytics/Final Project/Data/Raw/GFD Raw.xlsx"))

GFD_renamed <- rename(GFD_Raw, assets.to.gdp = 'Central bank assets to GDP (%)', credit.to.gdp = 'Credit to government and state-owned enterprises to GDP (%)', credit.to.private = 'Domestic credit to private sector (% of GDP)')

```

```{r}
#4
plot1 <-
  ggplot(GFD_Raw, aes(x = Year, y = po4, color = lakename)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = FALSE, col = "black") +
  labs(x = "TP (ug/L)", y = "PO4 (ug/L)") + 
  xlim(0, 100) +
  ylim(0, 40)
print(phos)

```
